description: Ensure that the dimensions of the output grid match those of the input grid.

Building on Step 1, transfer all tiles that are colored 3 from the input grid to the corresponding positions in the output grid. Ensure that each tile is placed accurately to maintain the grid's structure and color distribution.

Building on Step 2, identify the cells or group of cells in the output grid that are completely surrounded on all four sides by color 3 tiles or the grid's border. Fill these identified cells with color 4 to finalize the transformation.
